name: Shawn S
text: Great crew, great food, great location, parking is bearable. Atmosphere is best. Downfall: their oven cooks pizza a little bit less crispy than Ballard. And they have no milkshakes. But overall, this location is one of my favorites.

name: Roman Adrian Morgan
text: Delicious! The staff were very friendly and walked me through my first experience. The ingredients tasted superb! Fresh, Hot and Scrumptious. A spacious place where you can chill and gather your thoughts, maybe work on something peacefully while you enjoy your meal.

name: BrIronman BTL
text: Excellent pizza!  Very helpful and friendly staff!

name: Jerome Cherry
text: MOD Pizza is a great place to get a thin-crust, design-your-pizza at a fair price.  And they serve Coke Zero if you want!

name: Kate Hailey
text: Fremont now welcomes a Mod Pizza to the neighbourhood. Right on Fremont between 34th and 35th (where Blue C Sushi was located). ‚Ä¶More

text: Nice to see MOD pizza in Fremont. It‚Äôs a good pizza chain, i normally enjoy their pizza. But the pizza i had here was not really what I would expect l. I guess the staff still hasn‚Äôt mastered the technique. The soda was pretty flat, so the quality is not there what you‚Äôd expect from MOD. But I am sure they‚Äôll get there soon.

Howevwr Mod Pizza is a great deal for a pizza with any toppings you want for under $10. I am from Brooklyn, and I can honestly say MOD pizza beats every other ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex Loumos
text: Local, fast counter-service pizza chain. Thin crust pizzas made to order with any assortment of toppings, salad available as well. The Fremont location has plenty of available indoor seating across two levels, quick service for takeout as needed.

name: Danny Carrao
text: Omg, love MOD Pizza - seriously, where else can you get a pizza made to order while you wait, with ANY combination of toppings. No. Limit. Plus, it's what $8? $9? Totally cheap! And if course, oh so good. Another benefit: they're a second ‚Ä¶More

name: Evan Williams
text: The subway of pizza! We've been here numerous times and haven't had the same pizza twice. With great service and even better location (right off of several bus routes in Fremont), it's certainly one of our go to spots.

name: James Cafferty
text: I don't know why, but the mod Pizza tasted better here then at the Udistrict mod pizza

name: Sina M
text: I liked being able to customize my pizza and making it as thick as I desired. The price was fairly reasonable, location convinient, and a lovely ambiance.

text: I love this place! Exactly what I want on a pizza and no name cakes! It doesn't get any better
